name: maintainerr
description: Maintainerr is a dashboard and event log viewer for monitoring a suite of self-hosted media servers. It connects to services like Jellyfin, Radarr, and Sonarr to track updates, downloads, and system status.
features: Media server monitoring: Track status and events from Jellyfin, Plex, Radarr, and Sonarr in one dashboard.
Event logging: View detailed logs of downloads, updates, and system events across all connected services.
Health checks: Monitor service availability and receive alerts when components go offline.
Update tracking: See when new content is added or existing content is upgraded across your media stack.
Unified dashboard: Access all media server metrics and logs from a single interface.
Download monitoring: Track active downloads and queue status from Radarr and Sonarr.
Storage metrics: View disk usage and available space across media library locations.
Service integration: Connect to multiple media services through their APIs for comprehensive monitoring.
Alert system: Configure notifications for important events like failed downloads or service outages.
Activity timeline: Review historical events and changes across your media infrastructure.
